QuestData.Title: Tiger Mastery
QuestData.Description: Legends speak of an elusive tigress... a feline so powerful that she dwarfs even the elder males. The hunters at Nesingwary's Expedition have hunted for her without success. Many of them have fallen prey to her raking claws, their bodies now decaying at the foot of her hill, north of Grom'gol.$b$bThey call the beast Sin'Dall.$b$bYou resolve to do what no $r has done before: hunt, kill, and claim the paw of Sin'Dall.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She prefers to look down upon the weaker tigers from atop her hill.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt Sin'Dall and return with her paw.
QuestData.RewardText: Most impressive, I do say! I send you out to defeat the kittens, and you return with a paw the size of a gnome! You are a true Master Tiger Hunter, $n!
